text: Bakkaatu fawaaki bunɗu on, bakkaatu fawaaki laƴuɗo on, bakkaatu fawaaki nawnuɗo on, fawaaki e wonkiiji mooɗon nde ñaamoton ka cuuɗi mooɗon maaɗum ka cuuɗi baabiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi neeniraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi musiɗɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi banndiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi bappiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi yaayiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗom ka cuuɗi kaawiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi neeniraaɓe mooɗon ka dewol, maaɗum ɗin ɗi jogiɗon cottirɗe muuɗum, maaɗum giɗo mooɗon. Bakkaatu fawaaki on nde hawtoton ñaamon maaɗum ñaamon ko on sertuɓe. Si on naatay e cuuɗi salminee e dow wonkiiji mooɗon, hiwraango immorde ka Alla barkinaango laaɓungo, ko wano nii Alla ɓannguniranta on Aayeeje ɗen belajo'o onon on haqqilay
